mapper.sql: id, eid, position, superior, evaluate, date, status
mapper.select: select t.*, p.id as pid,p.name as pname,p.objective as pobjective,p.amortization as pamortization,p.salary as psalary,p.travel_allow as travel_allow,p.mobile_allow as pmobile_allow,p.description as description,p.date as pdate,p.status as status, s.id as sid,s.fullname as sfullname,s.code as scode,s.sex as ssex,s.address as saddress,s.mobile as smobile from employee_promote t,employee s,position_dic p where t.eid=s.id and t.position = p.id and t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.*, p.id as pid,p.name as pname,p.objective as pobjective,p.amortization as pamortization,p.salary as psalary,p.travel_allow as travel_allow,p.mobile_allow as pmobile_allow,p.description as description,p.date as pdate,p.status as status, s.id as sid,s.fullname as sfullname,s.code as scode,s.sex as ssex,s.address as saddress,s.mobile as smobile from employee_promote t,employee s,position_dic p where t.eid=s.id and t.position = p.id and t.eid = #{emid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.*, p.id as pid,p.name as pname,p.objective as pobjective,p.amortization as pamortization,p.salary as psalary,p.travel_allow as travel_allow,p.mobile_allow as pmobile_allow,p.description as description,p.date as pdate,p.status as status, s.id as sid,s.fullname as sfullname,s.code as scode,s.sex as ssex,s.address as saddress,s.mobile as smobile from employee_promote t,employee s,position_dic p where t.eid=s.id and t.position = p.id and 1=1 order by date desc
limit ${offset}, ${pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into employee_promote (id, eid, position, superior, evaluate, date, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into employee_promote
id,
eid,
position,
superior,
evaluate,
date,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{position.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{superior,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update employee_promote
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
superior = #{superior,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
evaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update employee_promote set eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, superior = #{superior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
